Package clientGUIControllers

Class CheckoutController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.CheckoutController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CheckoutController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, Observer
This class display to the user his cart and let him have the option of cancel or confirm the order, also able to press back to MyOrderScreen to continue and edit the order This class makes user of this tables 'productinfacility' or 'product', which contain the product details (for updating inventory according to user selection)

    backPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is called when the user pressed the return button, the method will transfer the user to previous window
    private void
    cancelOrder()
    This method cancels the order, send a request to the server to return products to the inventory.
    (package private) void
    cancelPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method gets called when the cancel button is pressed, cancel the order and return the user to the make order screen
    (package private) void
    confirmPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is called when the confirm button is pressed and transfer the user to the payment screen
    void
    initialize(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1)
    Initialize the checkout with the necessary values and show the default information needed on the checkout screen
    private void
    initLater()
    This method load all the product in your cart on the screen each in a new thread
    private void
    loadProductRow(ProductInFacility product)
    This method loads the scene of a product row in the cart and displays it on the screen
    (package private) void
    logoutPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is called when the user pressed the logout button, the method perform a logout and change to the login screen
    private void
    timeEndOrder()
    This method handles the force close and cancel of the order when the order timer is up
    void
    update(Object data)
    update method from observer interface gets called from timer which not run on main thread there for cannot change the UI (runLater waiting and run the command on main thread) displaying the timer and calling the timeEndOrder when time is up
    (package private) void
    xBtnPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method gets called when the x button is pressed and logout and quit the program
